sentences.en: Catalysis may be either homogeneous or heterogenous.
sentences.cn: 催化可以是均相的,也可以是多相的.

sentences.en: Discrete data is not necessarily homogeneous, and discrete selection is not necessarily contiguous.
sentences.cn: 离散数据不一定是同一类的, 离散选择也不一定是连续的.

sentences.en: Educators try to put pupils of similar abilities into classes because they believe that this homogeneous grouping is advisable.
sentences.cn: 教育学家设法将学生按相近的能力分班,因为他们认为这种按同等水平划分班级的做法是明智的.

sentences.en: Energy ( variance ) of the small - scale motions is not homogeneous.
sentences.cn: 小尺度运动的能量 ( 偏差 ) 是不均匀的.

sentences.en: Growth models usually consider labor as homogeneous.
sentences.cn: 增长模型常常把劳动力视为同质的.

sentences.en: Homogeneous bridging groups always raise the glass temperature.
sentences.cn: 同类桥联基因总是提高玻璃化温度.

sentences.en: Homogeneous nucleation is made possible by statistical fluctuations among molecular aggregates in the vapour.
sentences.cn: 同质成核作用之所以可能,是由于蒸汽中分子凝聚的统计起伏.

sentences.en: The conclusion must be homogeneous with the basic facts of the science.
sentences.cn: 结论必定会与科学的基本事实同一.

sentences.en: The homogeneous fluid considered is in motion.
sentences.cn: 所考虑的均质流体处于运动状态.

sentences.en: The initial stress or deformation fields are not usually homogeneous.
sentences.cn: 初始胁强场或初始形变场通常并不是均匀的.

sentences.en: The unemployed are not a homogeneous group.
The written language is often far more homogeneous than the spoken.
sentences.cn: 书面语比口语往往更加一致.

sentences.en: Thorough stirring is essential in order to obtain a homogeneous product.
sentences.cn: 为了获得质地均匀的制成品,最主要的是必须充分搅拌.

sentences.en: We shall be concerned essentially with homogeneous reactions.
sentences.cn: 我们将主要涉及均相反应.

words.tran_cn: 成为均匀分布的微粒的
使均匀；使类同；使（牛奶、奶油等中的油脂粒）分布均匀；变均匀（homogenize的过去式）
[化学]均匀的；[数]齐次的；[生物]同种的

phrases.tran_cn: 均匀系；均相系统；同机种系统

trans.tran_cn: 同性质的，同类的，由相同（或同类型）事物（或人）组成的，均匀的，[数]齐性的，齐次的
trans.tran_en: Homogeneous is used to describe a group or thing which has members or parts that are all the same
